I have 9+ years of experience in IT engineering and operations, mostly in cloud transformation projects specializing in technical writing.

I started as a software engineer intern at a local IT consulting agency, this led to a role as an IT analyst in enterprise operations at Honeywell. There, I learned the importance of technical documentation in enhancing user experience and technology adoption, leading me to specialize in technical writing.
